page.title: 02MR TEMPERO AND ANDOVER con.
page.content: When the railway line was there it made big traffic jams because there were gates across the road.Now Andover has a by_pass which goes right round the town. Today there are no traffic lights in town instead we have mini roundabouts which are better.Mr Tempero said that the best things in Andover today are the Sports centre and Cricklade College.There are 9 primary schools in town and 3 senior schools and the 6th form College. Mr Tempero liked Andover best when it was a small little market town and he was editor of the Andover Advertiser.
